section.title: Location-Speakers
section.para: Varieties and subdialects of Rendille are spoken in Kenya, between Lake Turkana and Mt. Marsabit.

biblioset.title: A Rendille dictionary: Including a grammatical outline and an English-Rendille Index

section.title: Paradigm Lexemes
section.para:
The following lexical items are used in the verbal paradigms:
The following lexical items are used in the verbal paradigms:
Lemma Gloss Label LexProperties Note
haaggan-
be good
haaggan
conjClass=stative,lang=rendille,pos=verb
he-
be
he
conjClass=prefix,lang=rendille,pdgmSubType=irreg,pos=verb
fur-P1
get untied
fur
conjClass=suffix,dervStem=pass1,lang=rendille,pos=verb
fur-
untie
fur
conjClass=suffix,dervStem=base,lang=rendille,pos=verb
karča
cook (tr)
kar
conjClass=suffix,dervStem=cause,lang=rendille,pos=verb
karsad
cook for self
kar
conjClass=suffix,dervStem=middle,lang=rendille,pos=verb
fur-P2
be untied
fur
conjClass=suffix,dervStem=pass2,lang=rendille,pos=verb
mi-
come
mi
conjClass=prefix,lang=rendille,pos=verb

inflectionClass: as in all languages, phonological and grammaticization processes conspire to create more or less marked morphophonemic differences in the verbal inflections of different sets of verbs.

section.title: Attested Archive Paradigms
section.para:
The following tabel lists the shared property=value pairs for each paradigm, and then the variable property=value-list (comma separated). The abbreviation "PNG" in the paradigm variable-value lists stnads for:
gender:f,m,⊤ number:pl,sg person:p1,p2,p3
I.e., the PNG combinations normal with finite tam-forms.Clicking on the paradigmLabel will yield a display of the paradigm in question [either by link to hard-coded term cluster, or canned SPARQL query].

table.caption: Table: Prop:Val List of Default Paradigms
